name: Vegan Mexican Quinoa Bowl with Green Chile Cilantro Sauce
author: Mackenzie Schieck
summary: Quinoa gets tossed with red bell peppers, black beans, romaine, and red onions, then smothered in a dairy-free sauce with a jalapeño kick. An easy meal!
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
½  jalapeno pepper with seeds, or more to taste
2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Combine cashews, green chile peppers, hemp milk, jalapeno pepper, and salt in a blender; process until smooth
Pour cashew mixture into a small bowl; stir in 1 cup cilantro
Bring water and quinoa to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Top with quinoa, black beans, red bell pepper, and onion
Garnish with remaining 1/4 cup cilantro and chopped avocados
